text: Miyuki-bashi is a Hiroden station tram stop on Hiroden Ujina Line located in Senda-machi 3-chome, Naka-ku, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Miyuki-bashi Station, there are two of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *25px Hiroshima Station - Hiroshima Port Route *25px Hiroden-nishi-hiroshima - Hiroshima Port Route ==Connections== ;█ Ujina Line :25px 25px ::Hiroden-honsha-mae — Miyuki-bashi — Minami-machi 6-chome ==Other services connections== ===Hiroden Bus services routes=== *Route #12 at "Miyuki-bashi" bus stop ===Hiroshima Bus services routes=== *Route #21-1 and #50 at "Miyuki-bashi" bus stop *Route #50 at "Shudo-gakuen-mae" bus stop ==Around station== *Miyuki-bashi (Miyuki bridge) *Shudo Junior High School, Shudo High School *Hiroshima Beauty College *Hiroshima Naka-ku sports center ==History== *Opened on November 23, 1912. *Closed from June 10, 1944 to August 16, 1945. *Reopened on August 17, 1945. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes Miyuki-bashi Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1912
